r.s: PHP extension for interfacing with MessagePack
r.d: This extension provide API for communicating with MessagePack serialization.
r.n: * Add support for PHP-8.1 Enums * merges #173 * fixes #171 * Add support for APCu * merges #162, #93 * Add OPT_ASSOC for roundtrip serialization of map. * merges #58
